snippet.title: Genius Greedy Mouse - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
A clay based puzzle game where you play as a mouse. A greedy mouse at that, who really loves cheese.

Genius Greedy Mouse (C) Space Fractal, Temple Tiger
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/485640/Genius_Greedy_Mouse/
